constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 190 (Thursday, October 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ROSENDALE:
H.R. 5787.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H6035]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Technology Modernization.

sponsors.fullName: Rep. Rosendale Sr., Matthew M. [R-MT-At Large]

title: Department of Veterans Affairs Telehealth Strategy Act
